It seems that you have not given permission to the camera, without it you will not be able to scan the QR code on the screen of another device, let\'s try each time Go to settings and enable camera permission Go to settings Choose you role Open previous screen from another device in same WIFI network and press \"I want to be server\" button Open previous screen from another device in same WIFI network and press \"I want to be client\" button Server Client I want to be server I want to be client Message from client Message from server Message to server Something went wrong Powered by Bohdan Oliinyk Save this QR code Clear saved QR code QR code was successfully saved!
